pv15:8.2: taṃ hi okiriṃ → taṃ vikīrihaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
pv15:21.1: gharā tā ca dāsiyo → te gharadāsiyo āsuṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2); te ghare dāsiyo ceva (mr)
pv15:11.2: tyāhaṃ → kiṃ tāhaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); kiṃ tyāhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); kiṃ vatāhaṃ (mr)
pv15:24.2: tedha → kiṃ vā ca te (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2); kiṃ vidha te (mr)
